abstract: Israeli plane carrying emergency housing leads flow of international aid into quake-stricken eastern Turkey; Turkey initially declined foreign assistance, but has sought help as the level of need for shelter and supplies has become clearer.
snippet: An Israeli plane carrying emergency housing led a flow of international aid into the quake-stricken area of eastern Turkey on Thursday, as two more people were pulled alive from the rubble.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli plane carrying emergency housing led a flow of international aid into the quake-stricken area of eastern Turkey on Thursday, as two more people were pulled alive from the rubble.

headline.main: Aid Arriving in Turkey Quake Area
